pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet provides a mixed set of drawings for the monorail installation in the mechanical room. It includes a plan view of the monorail layout and several section views detailing structural components. The sections illustrate various levels, including the concourse and lower concourse levels. The sheet is issued for information only and is not for construction.
